ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: WHOOPIE!!! So it DOES get better later on!! ~Xillith, grumpy mistress of death
ygData.messageBody:
WHOOPIE!!!

So it DOES get better later on!!

~Xillith, grumpy mistress of death


>From: "Howard Chan" <howard.chan@...>
>Reply-To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
>To: <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
>Subject: [eq_shadowknights] (no subject)
>Date: Wed, 7 Jul 1999 06:10:37 -0600
>
>From: "Howard Chan" <howard.chan@...>
>
>Yes, I have another complaint about the Shadow Knight. I just recently
>found
>out that the Shadow Knight get Breath Of The Dead and Shadow Sight at level
>49. While Paladins get a new line of buff and Revive at level 49, SKs get
>spells that basically mimic a Greater Lighstone and a Fishbone Earring.
>Yes,
>that is correct, my friends, after 49 levels of getting KOSed, experience
>penalties and sitting for hours to heal, we are rewarded with an
>enhancement
>to vision - ultravision that Dark Elves already have at level 1. And if one
>has a Fishbone Earring, then 'Yay!' for us because there goes another
>wasted
>slot in the book. In conclusion, at level 50, the Shadow Knight will have
>Voice Graft, Shieldskin, Breath Of The Dead and Shadow Sight that he/she
>will never use.
>
>
